media:group.media:title: [Quest Guide] Sleeping giants
media:group.media:description:
items needed: 
- 3 oak logs
- 10 metal nails
- Hammer
- Chisel
- Wool (regular so not spun into a ball)

recommended:
 - (Bucket of water or ice gloves)                                                                                                        
- 21 empty invent slots ignoring the required items

Teleports:
- 1 quest completion
Quests: /
skills: 15 Smithing

0:00 intro
1:00 repairing machinery
3:00 creating a flat broad sword

0) run from Al Kharid east following the path up the giants plateau
 SW of it is the quest start

1) Strike the Giant to talk to Kovac 1
 Triggers a 1 minute cutscene
 Put your phone on the keyboard to press space
  We are first going to fix all the machinery in the foundry and then do the smithing minigame once

2) SW  fix the polishing wheel  1

3) W  fix grindstone  1

4) NW  fix triphammer  1

5) Talk to Kovac to make your first giant’s sword  fade to black

6) Talk to Kovac again  you make a flat broad sword

7) Drop your hammer and chisel if you do not have 21 inventory slots
 search the crate next to Kovac for some metals
 search the pile of buckets west if you have not brought a bucket of water or ice gloves
  fill your bucket with water

8) Behind Kovac is a big metal bucket  click on it twice and deposit all the bronze and iron bars  next use the weapons and platebodies on it and deposit them too

9) Talk to Kovac
 set up the mould next to him  
  first tab is the forte  select the flattest and broadest
  second tab is the blade 
  3rd is the tap   
 bottom left you can check your flatness and broadness
 set the mould


10) Talk to Kovac and he’ll check it out
  pour the crucible into the mould
  pour bucket of water over the mould
  pick up the sword

11) Go NW and wait until your top red bar has a white outline
 Use the Trip hammer until it almost reaches yellow
  This should be around 8 hits with the hammer
 Go NE and rightclick on the lava  DUNK preform
  until red bar is almost at the end as it must still have a white outline
 Use trip hammer again until your bottom bar reaches yellow

12) Go to the waterfall and quench the preform until the sword’s temperature is almost yellow
 use the grindstone and waterfall until the sword is almost complete

13) Quench the presform until it is high green
 SW use the polishing wheel
 Dunk it in the lava one last time until the temperature is high green again
 polish it one last time to complete your quest

14) Talk to Kovac
  the sword commission is for his friend Obor

1 QP
6k smithing
Access to use the giant's foundry whenever you like
